article_title: 8 Things You Should Know About Challenging A Medical Bill

article_metadata.author: Kate Ashford

og.description: The rise of high-deductible health plans means that we're responsible for more of our own healthcare costs—so medical billing errors will hurt more. Here's what you should know about disputing those charges.
og.title: 8 Things You Should Know About Challenging A Medical Bill
